title: Loving Lulu
description: Julio Rodriguez gives his family all he’s got, but it’s not enough for Luanne. Home with two kids, she craves a taste of the real world. . . Lu's music is her ticket to freedom, but will her family survive the ride?Janie Dupree feels a little broken, but she's Kyle Wright's dream come true. The three tour Purple Heart and bona fide American hero decides he's her man. . . It’s easy for Janie to give Kyle her heart, but what about the rest of her?
author: Lilly Christine
